title: Can Yasuo animation cancel like Riven?

replies.body: Yes it can be done. Was done at world championship and remember the commentators being super hyped about it.

Why the hell would it? The damage would be insanely stupid.

The reason Riven has animation cancelling in the first place is because of her design origins being a homage/throwback to arcade fighters where animation cancelling is a thing during combos.

Arcade Riven where?
Not exactly sure I have never heard a Yasuo player mention it so I am guessing no.
